data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all available historical GlobalWineScore records across all wines and vintages. message: Operation 'get_/globalwinescores/latest/' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_input_details. Original summary uses unexplained 'GWS' acronym and is imprecise about what 'latest' means. Description lacks clarity on the deduplication behavior (one per wine/vintage), pagination, and practical use cases. Added explanation of the operation's purpose for synchronization, clarified the per-wine/vintage deduplication logic, and noted the default ordering behavior mentioned in API documentation for continuous synchronization.

data.current_description: Returns the latest GWS available per wine/vintage.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve latest GlobalWineScore for each wine
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the most recent GlobalWineScore record for each unique wine/vintage combination. Returns one score per wine/vintage pair, representing the latest available rating. Supports filtering and sorting through query parameters. Ideal for continuous synchronization workflows or obtaining current wine ratings without historical duplicates. Returns a paginated list of GlobalWineScore objects with the newest scores first when using default ordering.
